New Records: Rohit Sharma hit 302 sixes in ODIs, behind only Shahid Afridi and Chris Gayle.
Babar Azam scored his first ODI fifty against India.
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored a quickfire fifty with 6 fours and 6 sixes.
Pakistan collapsed with 8 wickets falling for 36 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India have now failed to win just 4 of their last 29 Cricket World Cup games.
Pakistan's previous worst World Cup collapse of 7 or more wickets came against England at the 1992 tournament, which Pakistan then went on to win.
Others: India have a one-sided head-to-head record against Pakistan at ICC Menâ€™s Cricket World Cups, winning all 8 meetings.
Sachin Tendulkar brought out the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023 trophy prior to the match.
